title: St. Paul's Hill
text: St. Paul's Hill () is a <a href="hill">hill</a> in <a href="Malacca%20City">Malacca City</a>, <a href="Malacca">Malacca</a>, <a href="Malaysia">Malaysia</a>. It was originally known as the Malacca Hill during the <a href="Malacca%20Sultanate">Malacca Sultanate</a> period and Mary's Hill during the <a href="Portuguese%20Malacca">Portuguese Malacca</a> period.
